comments.raw_text:
http://people.mozilla.com/~shorlander/devTools/devTools-02.html

loading this page fully and then scrolling up and down or switching tabs and returning is full of fail. Images disappear and re-appear and sometimes don't re-appear.

tested with today's Fennec on an Asus Transformer in landscape mode with and without tab sidebar showing

comments.raw_text: This is because we discard images even if they're currently being displayed. We need to not discard images if they're being displayed, which I think depends on tn's work in bug 689623. (Desktop definitely does.)
